name: spinoff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a product that develops from another more important product: The research has had spinoffs in the development of medical equipment.
a television or other show involving characters from a previous show: The stage show is a spinoff from a TV show.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a result that is produced in addition to the main result of a process: The research has spinoffs in the development of medical equipment.
A spinoff is also a separate company formed from parts of an existing company.
